attributes.action: Reinstate the 0% Corporation Tax rate for small businesses where profits are £10,000 or less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most new or small limited companies are currently fighting to survive in the current economic climate. These very same businesses, if they are able to survive are the life-blood of our economy. With the VAT rate being raised again in Jan 2010 to 17.5% and the retail sector being particularly affected, the reintroduction of the 0% rate of corporation tax would potentially save the lives of many struggling small businesses.
